Detailed Description

Expand a Item into other items.

This kind of questions are usefull for build up areas (get one or more street segment items), categories (get the companies in the category), streets (get the street segments that the street have) etc. NB! Currently only build up areas ar implemented!

After the normal RequestPacket header this packet contains:
PosSizeComment
+0 4 Item ID
+4 4 Expansion type

See also:
ExpandItemReplyPacket
